root.name: Zangeki no Reginleiv
root.description: OverviewThe game's Japanese title 斬撃のREGINLEIV (Zangeki no Reginleiv) translates literally to "The Slashing of Reginleiv." It was the first Wii title to receive a black box design. This black box is reserved for mature-rated Wii (later 3DS, as well) titles in Japan (rated Cero C and above). Furthermore, Zangeki no Reginleiv was the first Wii title after Wii Sports Resort to require the use of the Wii MotionPlus accessory (although it also supported the Classic Controller).
